name: Werewolf out of Water (Demo)
description:
Keith is a werewolf who had lost a bet, against all odds, and got sent to a faraway planet. He now has to survive two weeks surrounded by the species he hates most; humans. Will he stay in hiding and make it home safely? Will he get found out? Will he even find love? You decide!

Demo contains;

  • 1 Love Interest (Lawrence)
  • A short, introductory sequence
  • 1 CG
  • 2 Mini-CG's
  • Around 2,900 words

Features in development;

  • More Love Interests (I'm not too sure how many I'll be adding, but they will be added after the main game is complete)
  • ~15,000 words (This is a wild guess and subject to change dramatically)
  • Many more CG's and Mini CG's

This is my first Visual Novel, so please excuse any bugs, or the less-than-appealing GUI.

Music Credits;

"Piano Warm Sentimental" by LesFM on YouTube (Title music that refuses to play)

"Art of Silence" byUniq on YouTube- (The very first music you hear)

"Morning Garden 2" by LesFM  on YouTube (The music that plays after meeting Lawrence)
